# delegate

**Instance Property**

An object you provide to receive events related to the user’s interaction with the LookAround view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBOutlet @MainActor weak var delegate: (any MKLookAroundViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Interacting with the controller

- **MKLookAroundViewControllerDelegate**: Methods you implement to respond to changes in the LookAround view controller.

items.description: Methods you implement to respond to changes in the LookAround view controller.
